string.text:
The Glock 18 is one of the most famous variants of the Glock 17. This handgun offers a really high RoF in exchange for precision and handling.
 %c[d_purple] - %c[ui_gray_2] Tritium sights
 %c[ui_gray_2]COMPATIBLE MOD KITS:
 %c[d_purple] • %c[ui_gray_2] Default: Specialized weapon mod kit
